name: Resilient Population
effect: Remove any 1 card in the Infection Discard Pile from the game. You may play this between the Infect and Intensify steps of an epidemic.

name: Airlift
effect: Move any 1 pawn to any city. Get permission before moving another player's pawn.

name: Government Grant
effect: Add 1 research station to any city (no City card needed).

name: One quiet night
effect: Skip the next Infect Cities step (do not flip over any Infection cards).

name: Forecast
effect: Draw, look at, and rearrange the top 6 cards of the Infection Deck. Put them back on top.
